ps2.9:2.2: saddhābalaṃ, vīriyabalaṃ, satibalaṃ, samādhibalaṃ, paññābalaṃ, hiribalaṃ, ottappabalaṃ, paṭisaṅkhānabalaṃ, bhāvanābalaṃ, anavajjabalaṃ, saṅgahabalaṃ, khantibalaṃ, paññattibalaṃ, nijjhattibalaṃ, issariyabalaṃ, adhiṭṭhānabalaṃ, samathabalaṃ, vipassanābalaṃ, dasa sekhabalāni, dasa asekhabalāni, dasa khīṇāsavabalāni, dasa iddhibalāni, dasa tathāgatabalāni”.
ps2.9:3.3: Sahajātānaṃ dhammānaṃ upatthambhanaṭṭhena saddhābalaṃ, kilesānaṃ pariyādānaṭṭhena saddhābalaṃ, paṭivedhādivisodhanaṭṭhena saddhābalaṃ, cittassa adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena saddhābalaṃ, cittassa vodānaṭṭhena saddhābalaṃ, visesādhigamaṭṭhena saddhābalaṃ, uttaripaṭivedhaṭṭhena saddhābalaṃ, saccābhisamayaṭṭhena saddhābalaṃ, nirodhe patiṭṭhāpakaṭṭhena saddhābalaṃ.
ps2.9:4.3: Sahajātānaṃ dhammānaṃ upatthambhanaṭṭhena vīriyabalaṃ, kilesānaṃ pariyādānaṭṭhena vīriyabalaṃ, paṭivedhādivisodhanaṭṭhena vīriyabalaṃ, cittassa adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena vīriyabalaṃ, cittassa vodānaṭṭhena vīriyabalaṃ, visesādhigamaṭṭhena vīriyabalaṃ, uttaripaṭivedhaṭṭhena vīriyabalaṃ, saccābhisamayaṭṭhena vīriyabalaṃ, nirodhe patiṭṭhāpakaṭṭhena vīriyabalaṃ.
ps2.9:11.9: Nīvaraṇe pajahanto paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ bhāvetīti— bhāvanābalaṃ …pe…
ps2.9:12.2: Kāmacchandassa pahīnattā nekkhamme natthi kiñci vajjanti—anavajjabalaṃ.
ps2.9:12.3: Byāpādassa pahīnattā abyāpāde natthi kiñci vajjanti—anavajjabalaṃ.
ps2.9:12.4: Thinamiddhassa pahīnattā ālokasaññāya natthi kiñci vajjanti—anavajjabalaṃ.
ps2.9:12.5: Uddhaccassa pahīnattā avikkhepe natthi kiñci vajjanti—anavajjabalaṃ.
ps2.9:12.6: Vicikicchāya pahīnattā dhammavavatthāne natthi kiñci vajjanti—anavajjabalaṃ.
ps2.9:12.7: Avijjāya pahīnattā ñāṇe natthi kiñci vajjanti—anavajjabalaṃ.
ps2.9:12.8: Aratiyā pahīnattā pāmojje natthi kiñci vajjanti anavajjabalaṃ.
ps2.9:12.9: Nīvaraṇānaṃ pahīnattā paṭhamajjhāne natthi kiñci vajjanti—anavajjabalaṃ …pe…
ps2.9:12.10: sabbakilesānaṃ pahīnattā arahattamagge natthi kiñci vajjanti—anavajjabalaṃ.
ps2.9:14.9: Nīvaraṇānaṃ pahīnattā paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ khamatīti— khantibalaṃ …pe…
ps2.9:16.4: Thinamiddhaṃ pajahanto ālokasaññāvasena cittaṃ nijjhāpetīti— nijjhattibalaṃ …pe…
ps2.9:17.2: Kāmacchandaṃ pajahanto nekkhammavasena cittaṃ vasaṃ vattetīti—issariyabalaṃ.
ps2.9:17.3: Byāpādaṃ pajahanto abyāpādavasena cittaṃ vasaṃ vattetīti—issariyabalaṃ.
ps2.9:17.4: Thinamiddhaṃ pajahanto ālokasaññāvasena cittaṃ vasaṃ vattetīti— issariyabalaṃ …pe…
ps2.9:17.5: sabbakilese pajahanto arahattamaggavasena cittaṃ vasaṃ vattetīti—issariyabalaṃ.
ps2.9:18.4: Thinamiddhaṃ pajahanto ālokasaññāvasena cittaṃ adhiṭṭhātīti— adhiṭṭhānabalaṃ …pe…
ps2.9:19.2: Nekkhammavasena cittassa ekaggatā avikkhepo samathabalaṃ, abyāpādavasena cittassa ekaggatā avikkhepo samathabalaṃ, ālokasaññāvasena cittassa ekaggatā avikkhepo samathabalaṃ …pe…
ps2.9:19.3: paṭinissaggānupassī assāsavasena cittassa ekaggatā avikkhepo samathabalaṃ, paṭinissaggānupassī passāsavasena cittassa ekaggatā avikkhepo samathabalaṃ.
ps2.9:20.2: Paṭhamena jhānena nīvaraṇe na kampatīti— samathabalaṃ.
ps2.9:20.6: Ākāsānañcāyatanasamāpattiyā rūpasaññāya paṭighasaññāya nānattasaññāya na kampatīti—samathabalaṃ.
ps2.9:20.10: Uddhacce ca uddhaccasahagatakilese ca khandhe ca na kampati na calati na vedhatīti—samathabalaṃ.
ps2.9:21.3: paṭinissaggānupassanā vipassanābalaṃ, rūpe aniccānupassanā vipassanābalaṃ, rūpe dukkhānupassanā vipassanābalaṃ …pe…
ps2.9:21.9: jarāmaraṇe aniccānupassanā vipassanābalaṃ, jarāmaraṇe dukkhānupassanā vipassanābalaṃ …pe…
ps2.9:21.19: Avijjāya ca avijjāsahagatakilese ca khandhe ca na kampati na calati na vedhatīti— vipassanābalaṃ.
ps2.9:23.2: Idha khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno aniccato sabbe saṅkhārā yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya sudiṭṭhā honti.
ps2.9:23.3: Yampi khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno aniccato sabbe saṅkhārā yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya sudiṭṭhā honti, idampi khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno balaṃ hoti, yaṃ balaṃ āgamma khīṇāsavo bhikkhu āsavānaṃ khayaṃ paṭijānāti—“khīṇā me āsavā”ti. (1)
ps2.9:24.1: Puna caparaṃ khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno aṅgārakāsūpamā kāmā yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya sudiṭṭhā honti.
ps2.9:24.2: Yampi khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno aṅgārakāsūpamā kāmā yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya sudiṭṭhā honti, idampi khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno balaṃ hoti, yaṃ balaṃ āgamma khīṇāsavo bhikkhu āsavānaṃ khayaṃ paṭijānāti—“khīṇā me āsavā”ti. (2)
ps2.9:25.1: Puna caparaṃ khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno vivekaninnaṃ cittaṃ hoti vivekapoṇaṃ vivekapabbhāraṃ vivekaṭṭhaṃ nekkhammābhirataṃ byantībhūtaṃ sabbaso āsavaṭṭhāniyehi dhammehi.
ps2.9:25.2: Yampi khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno vivekaninnaṃ cittaṃ hoti vivekapoṇaṃ vivekapabbhāraṃ vivekaṭṭhaṃ nekkhammābhirataṃ byantībhūtaṃ sabbaso āsavaṭṭhāniyehi dhammehi, idampi khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno balaṃ hoti, yaṃ balaṃ āgamma khīṇāsavo bhikkhu āsavānaṃ khayaṃ paṭijānāti—“khīṇā me āsavā”ti. (3)
ps2.9:26.1: Puna caparaṃ khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno cattāro satipaṭṭhānā bhāvitā honti subhāvitā.
ps2.9:26.2: Yampi khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno cattāro satipaṭṭhānā bhāvitā honti subhāvitā, idampi khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno balaṃ hoti, yaṃ balaṃ āgamma khīṇāsavo bhikkhu āsavānaṃ khayaṃ paṭijānāti—“khīṇā me āsavā”ti. (4)
ps2.9:27.1: Puna caparaṃ khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno cattāro sammappadhānā bhāvitā honti subhāvitā …pe…
ps2.9:27.6: ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāvito hoti subhāvito.
ps2.9:27.7: Yampi khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāvito hoti subhāvito, idampi khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno balaṃ hoti, yaṃ balaṃ āgamma khīṇāsavo bhikkhu āsavānaṃ khayaṃ paṭijānāti—“khīṇā me āsavā”ti.
ps2.9:28.2: Adhiṭṭhānā iddhi, vikubbanā iddhi, manomayā iddhi, ñāṇavipphārā iddhi, samādhivipphārā iddhi, ariyā iddhi, kammavipākajā iddhi, puññavato iddhi, vijjāmayā iddhi, tattha tattha sammā payogappaccayā ijjhanaṭṭhena iddhi—
ps2.9:29.2: Idha tathāgato ṭhānañca ṭhānato aṭṭhānañca aṭṭhānato yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti.
ps2.9:29.3: Yampi tathāgato ṭhānañca ṭhānato aṭṭhānañca aṭṭhānato yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti, idampi tathāgatassa tathāgatabalaṃ hoti, yaṃ balaṃ āgamma tathāgato āsabhaṃ ṭhānaṃ paṭijānāti parisāsu sīhanādaṃ nadati, brahmacakkaṃ pavatteti. (1)
ps2.9:30.1: Puna caparaṃ tathāgato atītānāgatapaccuppannānaṃ kammasamādānānaṃ ṭhānaso hetuso vipākaṃ yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti.
ps2.9:30.2: Yampi tathāgato atītānāgatapaccuppannānaṃ kammasamādānānaṃ ṭhānaso hetuso vipākaṃ yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti, idampi tathāgatassa tathāgatabalaṃ hoti, yaṃ balaṃ āgamma tathāgato āsabhaṃ ṭhānaṃ paṭijānāti, parisāsu sīhanādaṃ, nadati, brahmacakkaṃ pavatteti. (2)
ps2.9:31.1: Puna caparaṃ tathāgato sabbatthagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti.
ps2.9:31.2: Yampi tathāgato sabbatthagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti, idampi tathāgatassa tathāgatabalaṃ hoti, yaṃ balaṃ āgamma tathāgato āsabhaṃ ṭhānaṃ paṭijānāti, parisāsu sīhanādaṃ nadati, brahmacakkaṃ pavatteti. (3)

ps2.9:32.2: Yampi tathāgato anekadhātuṃ nānādhātuṃ lokaṃ yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti, idampi tathāgatassa …pe…. (4)
ps2.9:33.1: Puna caparaṃ tathāgato sattānaṃ nānādhimuttikataṃ yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti.
ps2.9:33.2: Yampi tathāgato sattānaṃ nānādhimuttikataṃ yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti, idampi tathāgatassa …pe…. (5)
ps2.9:34.1: Puna caparaṃ tathāgato parasattānaṃ parapuggalānaṃ indriyaparopariyattaṃ yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti.
ps2.9:34.2: Yampi tathāgato parasattānaṃ parapuggalānaṃ indriyaparopariyattaṃ yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti, idampi tathāgatassa …pe…. (6)
ps2.9:35.1: Puna caparaṃ tathāgato jhānavimokkhasamādhisamāpattīnaṃ saṃkilesaṃ vodānaṃ vuṭṭhānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti.
ps2.9:35.2: Yampi tathāgato jhānavimokkhasamādhisamāpattīnaṃ saṃkilesaṃ vodānaṃ vuṭṭhānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti, idampi tathāgatassa …pe…. (7)
ps2.9:36.1: Puna caparaṃ tathāgato anekavihitaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ anussarati, seyyathidaṃ—
ps2.9:36.3: iti sākāraṃ sauddesaṃ anekavihitaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ anussarati.
ps2.9:37.1: Puna caparaṃ tathāgato dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena satte passati cavamāne upapajjamāne …pe…
ps2.9:37.2: yampi tathāgato dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena satte passati cavamāne upapajjamāne …pe…
ps2.9:38.1: Puna caparaṃ tathāgato āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati.
ps2.9:38.2: Yampi tathāgato āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati, idampi tathāgatassa tathāgatabalaṃ hoti, yaṃ balaṃ āgamma tathāgato āsabhaṃ ṭhānaṃ paṭijānāti, parisāsu sīhanādaṃ nadati, brahmacakkaṃ pavatteti.
ps2.9:40.9: Tattha jātā dhammā ekarasā hontīti— bhāvanābalaṃ.
